mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account (name, password, mail, auth_key) VALUES (#{username},#{password}, #{mail}, #{authKey});
insert into account (auth_key) values (#{authKey}) where name = #{username};
mapper.update: update account set isEmail_verified = 1 where name = #{username};
mapper.select: select auth_key from account where name = #{username}
select password from account where name = #{username};
